website_summaries.verdict: An affordable brow powder set that comes in several different shades and includes a wax.
pros: Comes in six different shade duos that make it easy to mix a custom shade to match your brows
Also includes a wax to hold brows in place and an angled brush for application
Powders are easy to use and last a long time
No need for a separate brow gel
cons: The wax can be a little tricky to use

customer_reviews.title: Easy for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I bought the taupe color because everything I buy in dark brown is too red! I have a fair cool skin tone and dark hair. This stuff stays on really well and dispite the brush looking cheap it works with this product nicely.
customer_reviews.author: MrE

customer_reviews.title: The wax really helps
customer_reviews.text: Who knew that eyebrows change with age? Not only do I need color with a little more substance to fill in spots with less hair, but some eyebrow hairs have started sticking up or out! This eyebrow powder and wax helps both problems. I'm a redhead with very light eyebrows. The auburn/red color is pretty good, though I use the darker color sparingly. I usually stroke on the powder first and then put the wax where needed. Just like there are bad hair days, there also seem to be "bad eyebrow days." Today was one, which inspired me to write a review after finishing my eyebrows.
customer_reviews.author: Green Eyes

customer_reviews.title: Great brows!
customer_reviews.text: As a man who has always dealt with weird eyebrows, I have never wanted to use a makeup kit for my eyebrows. I tried this on a whim and realized if used correctly it doesn't look like you makeup and can get a realistic look.
customer_reviews.author: Curran

customer_reviews.title: effortless beauty, not heavy
customer_reviews.text: Way better than using pencil or liquid allat extra stuff! Worth the price! Great quality! Makes you look A1 Effortlessly! Not heavy, stays on all day you could touch it multiple times and it'll still be there and look good, no smudges or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Luz

customer_reviews.title: Gray eyebrow powder
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a gray eyebrow powder I can use! I have salt & pepper hair (mostly silver) and this is the first brow powder that is a good compromise. My eyebrows are almost non-existent. Although my hair was once brown - brown eyebrows looked silly. Black was too dark. This stuff is good - stays on all day, can add a little of the darker shade for emphasis in the evening.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I'm 62 years old and my brows have suffered from the '70s on with the over tweezing we did back then. They're sparse and spotty. So I've had microblading, used every product to make them grow, and on and on. This is the easiest and best product I've found, and I've spent a fortune on my eyebrows. Who knew that $5 could've saved me all that. From Wunderbrow to Anastasia pencils, this product beats them all.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L. Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Best brow stuff I've used, love it.
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely a process to use this. I find it impossible to use the tiny brushes that come with it, so it's good that I have my own. I only use the small angled brushes for applying the wax (which goes first.) I'm worried that I'm going to run out of wax way before color, though. The two tones are AWESOME for doing fading brows, and the product goes one smoothly and cleanly. One thing I've noticed is that the wax gives your eyebrows a shiny finish. I'm going to start powdering mine with translucent power to make them look more normal. When I run out, I might switch to something different but I'd consider buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad I tried this. Changed my eyebrow game.
customer_reviews.text: Literally my favorite eyebrow make up I’ve ever bought. And I’ve tried it all from pencils to powders to gels. I put the wax on first with the slanted brush and then I use an eyeliner brush to apply the darker powder. Then I use another slanted brush to do the edges with the lighter powder. Then I blend together with the wand brush. It stays on all day, looks decently natural, and is easy to shape into whatever style your eyebrows are trying to be. I’ll only be buying this product from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Turns too reddish on my skin -
customer_reviews.text: It's not you, it's me - honestly - I could just stay with you a while longer... maybe til summer and then we'll see if there's any improvement?? This always happens - unless I can find something that's really, really, FLAT ASH/grey - they ALL seem to turn on me... it LOOKS really grayish in the pallet (I'm not even touching the 'Taupe', only using 'Ash'), but a coupla'minnits after applying: REDDISH & DARKER - yes, I'm often ghostly pale, but I'd like to have eyebrows that actually SHOW, and it would be fantastic if they 'looked real'... *sigh* thank you, next...
customer_reviews.author: LadyFville

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyebrow powder! I have super blonde eyebrows and this lets me color them perfectly. I have used brow powders before, but had not tried one with wax in it before and boy was I missing out. I can get great definition using the wax, even the ends of my eyebrows where the hair is a bit sparse colors in just as well as the middles. I get a much more natural look with this than I could with pencils. I use the wax first, then apply the color.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M.

customer_reviews.title: Eyebrows on fleek
customer_reviews.text: My eyebrows have never looked so good. I've always struggled to make these babies look like the beauty gurus but this product makes it so easy to do. Worth the price 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie and Eric

customer_reviews.title: Love NYX charcoal for Asian brows
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a review for the NYX automatic pencil for he eyebrow. This color and Brand is the only one I trust for my Asian eyebrows. My hair is brownish black.. when I use black, it looks too tough.. and brown is too light and fake on me. This gray is absolutely PERFECT!!! I love this when I pair it with the NYX auto pencil. I use the pencil to outline and this to fill and make look real!! I love this purchase!!! :D
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: perfect match for natural redhead
customer_reviews.text: I'm a natural strawberry blonde with invisible blonde brows, and the struggle for brow colors is real! Most red/auburn products tend to either lean pink or orange, and most blonde colors are just too cool toned to look right. These 2 colors seem to balance for a more natural look. Since I'm on the lighter side, I tend to use more of the neutral blonde color, with just a smidge of the darker red for a natural look. But if you have a darker red/auburn color you're going for, the darker shade would match pretty perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Zyreah

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best eyebrow makeup available! The two colors give me versatility coordinating with the colors of my eye makeup and my clothes. For everyday wear, I apply it dry for a softer look. For a bolder look, I dampen the angled brush before putting it in the powder. My brows last all day and into the night. I don't use the wax because it makes my brows look unnaturally shiny, greasy, and dirty looking. I have been using NYX for years and can no longer find this product in retail. Thank you Amazon for making it available!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carolee888

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is the best!
customer_reviews.text: I originally found this at Target and when I went back for more, they weren't carrying it any longer. I was so happy to find it on Amazon and ordered two. I've tried SO many eyebrow pencils and powders and this stuff is by far the best. The color blends in so well and the brush gives the perfect amount and density. I put a little of both colors on because that seems to match best with my color but whether you need dark or light, it will blend well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Wax holds nicely, fills well and looks clean
customer_reviews.text: I am still learning how to do my brows and have extremely sparse, light eyebrows. I like this stuff, the wax holds hairs in place and I used the powder after a different brow liner pencil to fill in and it worked great. My eyebrows looked better than I've ever gotten them. I outlined brows with concealer after I was done to get cleaner lines. Only wish it would have came with instructions but you can find YouTube vids for that.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Oldenburger

customer_reviews.title: The best Eyebrow Cake for Redheads, hands down.  Even my hairdresser recommends it to her other clients now.
customer_reviews.text: Redheads unite! It is impossible to find eyebrow color that won't make us look like Bozo the Clown until now. I have used a pencil by Cella that was around 20 bucks that didn't look near as natural as this little kit which is MUCH cheaper. I de-pan the wax because I don't use it and I had a little accident with my first set where it melted in my kit in a hot car, oops. I bought a new set and took the wax out and now it's fabulous. A little goes a long way for those of us with white eyebrows so for about 5 bucks, I will have beautiful brows for at least a year.
customer_reviews.author: GingerInKC

customer_reviews.title: Essential when drawing on entire brows from scratch
customer_reviews.text: My favorite eyebrow powder - I don't think Nyx sells this anymore, so I'm stocking up. I have very little to no brows, so a thick powder is essential when mapping everything out/providing texture before using a pencil to define the shape. I also like the tiny brush that's included since it's able to pack it on more like a packing eyeshadow brush and not a paintbrush or other type of face brush. I don't use the wax at all, but the powder alone is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: “Brunette“ is for warmer medium brown imo
customer_reviews.text: I really like NYX overall. This little palette looks smaller in person but it’s plenty of product for eyebrows. I don’t use wax just the shades. I have to say though, I am a brunette And this seems a bit, I dont know how to say, I guess almost too warm for me. It’s a nice shade if you have more red or warmth in your brow hair but mine are Darker and cooler than my “main hair” :D I’m going to get the grey/black shade and see if it works better.
customer_reviews.author: Alina B-C

customer_reviews.title: Redhead here and this is great!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. This is the first time I've found the perfect colors to blend to actually make my eyebrows show up. The kit comes with a spooly and a brush to fill it. I was able to do my eyebrows perfectly the very first time and it actually matched my hair color. Finally I have red eyebrows and not translucent!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J.

customer_reviews.title: Loyal fan
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. The color is great. The application is easy. The only thing I don’t like is the little chisel tip brush it comes with. That brush is worthless and way too thick (I toss it right away and use my own each time) - That’s the only reason why I’m giving it 4 stars and not 5 (it’s not a huge issue for me, but I know it might be for others). But other than that, I LOVE this product.
customer_reviews.author: Girl

customer_reviews.title: Okay brow product for red heads
customer_reviews.text: I have light strawberry blonde hair and have a hard time finding eyebrow products that match. This is just too red for me. I also don't feel like the product has as much staying power as other brow products, but maybe I just don't know how to apply correctly. I'll continue to use my go to brow pomade, which I buy in the color blonde. For a light brow product that is not too harsh, this would work well for true red heads.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Application &colors are perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Powders are tiny and the brushes are very tiny too and can't use them as my hands are bug. But, that's ok I have my own brushes. Color matches my eyebrows and I love the way it applies... flawless. Most if my brow powders last forever so I'm sure this one will too.
customer_reviews.author: Angie G Miranda

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS EVERYTHING and a SAVIOR for your WALLET$$$$
customer_reviews.text: Save your money on department store and BRAND stupidity! Stop making other people rich with $50 eyebrow pencil - really - they are CRAYONS people! BUY THIS and Get yourself some WET n WILD (WET N WILD Color Icon Brow Pencil - Brunettes Do It Better or whatever color you need) and go to town on those brows! I also use NYX brow pencil - works like a charm too but the Wet N Wild LASTS MUCH MUCH MUCH longer for less$
customer_reviews.author: CPerkins

customer_reviews.title: Very good brow powder
customer_reviews.text: This color is perfect for my dark brown brows. (I’ve purchased brown shade before and it was too chestnuty - my hair have warmth but the brows are cool in shade) I mostly use the grey one and just a tad of black. Overall NYX brow products are my favorite, do what they’re supposed to and very affordable! (Ps I don’t use the wax- I stead I buy NYX Black brow gel.)
customer_reviews.author: Alina B-C

customer_reviews.title: Product case is excellent for left-handed people. Uncomfortable for right handed
customer_reviews.text: The product I got is made for left-handed opening and use. I think that’s wonderful but I’m right handed so one needs to turn the product upside down to be able to open up the lid to be able to use the product without bumping into the lid. I think that should be designated in the description but for five bucks it’s a waste to return it to be trashed and I hear good stuff about the product inside. I’ll will give it a try
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Works but..
customer_reviews.text: This actually works pretty good. But it does have some fall out when in use so I do not recommend carrying this around in your purse! I also recommend you using your own eyebrow brush for a more finer and cleaner look. This brush it comes with is not as precise as it needs to be. In the picture I used my own personal brush versus the one it came with.
customer_reviews.author: zombierose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. My eyebrows looks so natural I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Cory Risseeuw

customer_reviews.title: Looks great with Red Hair
customer_reviews.text: I dyed my hair red and I wanted my eyebrows to match so I bought this. It looks great with my hair and I really like the clear eyebrow gel which sweeps my brows give it a clean polished before I apply the color powder with the small brush. It's compact and will fit my make up bag nicely too.
customer_reviews.author: NC Saeteurn

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate brown not dark brown
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the dark brown/brown and unfortunately, it's much more of a chocolate brown. Haven't been able to use since the first time I applied because it looks ridiculous against my natural hair color (very dark, almost black/brown). Its a great powder, lots of pigmentation, easy to apply just be wary of the shade
customer_reviews.author: MrsJ

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I think I am going to make this a regular purchase. But since I don't wear makeup all too often, I'm thinking once every 3 months or so. It's great because the colors don't look unnatural at all, and sticks well without smearing. It also has very light weight packaging for easy carry and applies well. I don't have too much (or really had any) experience with eyebrow lining before using this product. Just the fact that I am going to do it regularly now because I look slightly better, is really telling about the quality of this product. Hopefully you can find the right shade too and use this. I was really lucky finding my shade.
customer_reviews.author: rolexTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: The kit is great but you’ll want a new brush for applying it
customer_reviews.text: I mix the colors together from the darker kit because I have really dark brown hair but I don’t want my eyebrows to look too dark on my face. It wipes off easily when are wanting it to, and sometimes I touch it up through the day but it’s great quality for the price. The brush it comes with is not good at all but you should just get a softer one. Do not leave in your car though the white gel part will melt!
customer_reviews.author: Josie_g04

customer_reviews.title: Finally an eyebrow color that is ashy brown instead of orange.
customer_reviews.text: I finally found an eyebrow powder that isn't a warm tone! This stays on all day if used correctly and looks natural. I always run out of the waxy part before the powder, so I just use petroleum jelly instead. Great price and one tray lasts me all year.
customer_reviews.author: Screenial

customer_reviews.title: Tried other things and come back
customer_reviews.text: So I am not a huge fan of the wax part getting kind of clumpy and building up, but honestly I have tried a few other things and keep coming back to this. I just keep the brush clean and it just works perfect. I only use one of the colors but even using only one is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: crimegirl

customer_reviews.title: Works fine to fill eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: Not the best eyebrow makeup on the market of course but for the price it works fine. I don’t have thin eyebrows so this works but I can see this not working for someone who has thin or blonde eyebrows just because itll so look natural. I use this more to fill in my eyebrows then actually create an eyebrow.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Not for light blondes
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to try this product. Application is similar to other eyebrow powders that I've tried in the past. I was hoping that this would be a good light blonde option since my eyebrows are super blonde, however I found it to still be too dark for me. The shade of my eyebrows using this product is too dark in comparison to my hair and is not a product I can use. But if you do not have light hair, I believe this product would work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with the wax and not happy with the powder
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the wax and not happy with the powder. I was looking for a decent ash grey without any brown/reddish colors. The lighter right color is ok. The left color gives an unnatural yellow-brown look (see pics). Plus, the applicators are of poor quality, not gonna use them. They cannot provide smooth layering without going too bright/dark
customer_reviews.author: La Mor

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: This was a rip off! Not worth purchasing! The product is much smaller than anticipated...the pans are very small didn’t look black powder looked more grayish brown. Not worth the purchase price
customer_reviews.author: Vee Doswell

customer_reviews.title: The Best for Grey Hair
customer_reviews.text: I have very dark grey hair and finding the right eyebrow powder is tough. The grey in this comes out looking darker than on my skin, but not harsh as black. So, I just use the grey. The applicator brush is not that good. I use a softer one of my own.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product
customer_reviews.text: The product applies easily and works well. I like its small size and adding the brushes and wax was a nice addition. The product was missing from the shipping envelope the first time it was shipped but Milo at Amazon was super helpful to overnight another one for me so I could take it on vacation today. Thanks to NYX and Milo!
customer_reviews.author: Evelin B.

customer_reviews.title: the brush's suck and the wax i feel like you could just ...
customer_reviews.text: this product is darker then the picture. i got brown/ dark brown and it seems that they are both really dark brown. i am a medium brunette and its kind of dark for me. the brush's suck and the wax i feel like you could just use clear mascara or body jelly (Vaseline) instead and do just as well i also found a trick to mix dark brown eye shadow with a very tan/light eye shadow and it works better for my hair color. also do the bottom line of your eyebrow and sweep it up with the eyebrow brush (mascara wand) i felt that was a helpful tip.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Ives

customer_reviews.title: Works well, great color
customer_reviews.text: Works just as good as higher end eyebrow powders. Great color if you have dark hair. I have dyed black hair and it’s great for looking like I have naturally dark brows, which I don’t. I’m not too fond of the wax though, use very sparingly unless you like the shiny wax look.
customer_reviews.author: Objective Female

customer_reviews.title: Great Powder; Crappy Brush
customer_reviews.text: The powder is great! It goes on easily, lasts a long time, and is easy to build up. I read reviews and saw that a little goes a long way, and I would definitely agree with that. This product would be perfect IF it had a better applicator brush. It's kind of thick and chunk... I have a finer tip one from Mary Kay that's great, but I'm sure basically ANY other brush would do the job better. Again, the product itself is great. It stays on through sweaty days, and long days too. Definitely worth it if you can also spring for a better brush.
customer_reviews.author: amnesiamoose

customer_reviews.title: Product makes natural, realistic eyebrows!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to make my eyebrows more noticeable. I'm not blessed with thick eyebrows so this will helps. It's easy to use, doesn't require a whole lot, and I get compliments on my eyebrows. People think they are my natural eyebrow!
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Muzien

customer_reviews.title: Great color and easy application
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best eyebrow product I've ever used. It's so easy to apply and looks natural. In the past, all the other eyebrow products I've tried look too red and fake. This color is perfect as I blend the two shades to achieve the perfect match. I still have plenty of product left but have needed to buy more wax since I ran out of that fairly quickly. I also recommend using your own brush and spoolie as these aren't the best quality.
customer_reviews.author: oakandleaf

customer_reviews.title: Great little product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have naturally mousey brown hair and I get a little red tinted into it. With the two tones, this helps me tint my eyebrows to match my hair no matter what stage of outgrowth I'm in between visits.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Too dark
customer_reviews.text: Got dark brown shade. I have ombre hair, black roots to dirty blond ends. My hair is mostly brown with lighter highlights and ends. This color is too dark; have to use very light handed. Unless you want strong bold eye brows stay away from darker shades. Also datk brown is too warm toned for my liking. Blond shade (darker shade in the pan) will work better if you want a more subtle natural look. With that said, fomula is great; blends and goes on easily; wax keeps the hair in place. Affordable and nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: For the price, it's definitely something I'm pleased with.
customer_reviews.text: It's near perfect. The kit comes with everything you need for your daily eyebrow application. The colors were just as expected. My tip would be to read the reviews to find the right shade for yourself! The one and only con I had with the kit was it was TINY! So much smaller than expected. I wish someone would have mentioned it before I purchased it - although I still would have went ahead a bought anyway. It just came as a huge shocker to me. The brushes I did not think I could use because of the size, but turned out application was super easy with the tiny brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Makenzie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with the eyebrow power -- but
customer_reviews.text: My eyebrows are light and getting sparse, as happens during the aging process. I have lots of grey hair, but high light it, so I'm basically a blonde....and the Blonde power is what I got. I'm very pleased with the eyebrow power -- but, IMO, you have to use a light touch i applying it. I don't want dark eyebrows and a light sweep of the power is just right for me. I've seen people post about disliking the application brush, but it's no problem for me. I'm quite pleased w/ my purchase. Oh...the seller was great -- really fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Said Fathy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply and looks great
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful. Easy to apply and my eyebrows are darker so this matches nicely. It's not expensive like my high end products and it looks so much better on my light/medium sometimes fair skin. Definitely will buy it again when I run out. I have yet need to reapply when I'm out and about. It takes only one application.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Dough

customer_reviews.title: Natural looking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product In auburn. It is very pigmented so apply with a light hand. The combo of powder and wax creates a groomed and still natural looking brow and the color is neutral rather than the weird orange or khaki green found in many brow
customer_reviews.author: RedheadwalkingTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I prefer powder over pencil when it comes to my eyebrows. This is the exact color of my natural brows and application couldn’t be any easier. It stays put, lasts and looks natural. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Florida GalTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great match to my dark brown hair
customer_reviews.text: Great match to my dark brown hair. I have found it to be pretty durable, too. I have worked out and gotten sweaty and it doesn't rub off, although I am conscience of it and try not to rub my face. The brushes that come with it are useable but I prefer to apply it with my own small angled brush. I don't use the wax. This product gives me very natural looking, full brows at an awesome price. Very happy. I also have found that lightly filling in my brows has given my face a more youthful look and who doesn't want that?
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: A bit disappointed. The brush is so small. So hard to hold while applying. You end up covering your face with your hand so it's hard to see where you are applying. The powder also does not catch well on the brush so you hardly get anything on the brush. It just powders around where the brush is trying to get some
customer_reviews.author: J A - San Jose, CA

customer_reviews.title: Brows are everthing
customer_reviews.text: I love the powder. It looks so natural & stays on good. It's matches my dark brown eyebrows perfectly. Easy to erase though if I do make a mistake. I like the wax but I feel like I need to reapply it in the middle of the day. The powder needs no retouching. Though with this cheap price I really can't complain much, right? I like the brushes it comes with. The packaging is nice and compact. Perfect for in your purse or travel makeup bag. I haven't taken on some trips with me & the powder and the plastic is still in one piece.
customer_reviews.author: joshua  harmon

customer_reviews.title: Great product for those with natural red hair
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical until I tried it! The best solution for us poor red heads with blonde eyebrows. I was dying mine but it washes out so quickly on red heads. This takes some morning effort but I have pretty brows to match my red hair. Thanks for thinking of us red heads!
customer_reviews.author: FatCat

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied for fadded black color eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: I really like this I have the most weirdest natural eyebrow color ever.. they are like fadded black but grey and I have some old microblading tat on my eyebrows still so I cant go lighter unfortunately this color blends perfectly and you cannot beat this price!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Burnam

customer_reviews.title: Good color
customer_reviews.text: This little kit works well. I prefer non wax eyebrows because I think I am allergic to paraben. This is perfect.Good color. I have med brown hair with some slight grey streaking, so taupe keeps it on the cool side of brown.
customer_reviews.author: LightRae

customer_reviews.title: Great, but you need your own brush
customer_reviews.text: Love this and working through my second one. The taupe color is perfect for brown/blonde haired individuals as it is not too dark and looks quite natural. Lasts all day. Did not give 5 stars because brush is a joke, it’s so hard, it’s unusable. Need to buy your own brush (Elf has a nice brow brush).
customer_reviews.author: Renaissance Girl

customer_reviews.title: Brow wiz + This!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I use Anastasia Brow wiz to draw an outline, and fill in my brows using this product. It’s pribably the easiest eyebrow routine I have followed over the years. I tried buying this at the NYX store, and heard this has been discontinued. I was happy to see this available on amazon 😊 I am gonna order another one and stock up just to be safe
customer_reviews.author: Deepika Ramachandran

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It’s not as pigmented as I would like and the wax comes off clumpy, I don’t even use that part anymore. But it works until I find something else better. Also like the size for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Always been a fan of NYX products, good quality without breaking the bank. This particular product is great for subtle eyebrow filling, or even bold eyebrow fills if using a pencil as an outline. Had this for a good while and still have plenty of product left.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Better than pencils and gels.
customer_reviews.text: I have used many products to fill in my eyebrows, including pencils and gels. I have found this to be the most effective. I apply the gel part first with the mascara-wand looking tool. Then I fill in the sparse parts with the dark color only (I have light brown hair) and then brush them once more with the wand to make sure they're the right shape. I think it looks very natural, and I even had someone compliment my eyebrows the other day. She said "Your eyebrows are so nice! You don't even have to fill them in, do you?" so I guess others can't tell either.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Convenient / works great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Powder stays out through the day. I really like that there is a mini brush and spooly provided. This is nice for when I grab makeup essentials on the go and can opt not to bring my full size brow brushes.
customer_reviews.author: kd !

customer_reviews.title: Nice, natural looking brow
customer_reviews.text: I really like this powder! I was using pencil and some tinted gels before testing this out and I think it looks much more natural. It can be tricky to get the right color blend though- both colors seem to have a reddish undertone, at least compared to my brows. For the price you can't beat it and I haven't had any trouble with it wearing off or bleeding onto my skin. The only time it may smudge is the minute or two while the wax dries, but otherwise it's worked really nicely for me.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Decent Brow Powder, Does its job
customer_reviews.text: Pretty average color, pretty average powder. Nothing special, but as expected and I was just looking for a replacement for my cheapo fill in powder. Works for my purposes! The picture looks a little more red than what the powder actually is, but obviously if you're purchasing "Taupe/Ash" you should expect such it to be...taupe/ash, and I found the description to match.
customer_reviews.author: Rena D.Top Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Matches perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this purchase, if you want to shape your eyebrows and achieve a natural look this is your product! Can't say the same about the NYX eyebrow pomade which darkened my eyebrows with an unnatural result.
customer_reviews.author: Kornldu

customer_reviews.title: Choose correct shade base on your skin color
customer_reviews.text: Compact is very small. You can even use it for a smokey eyeliner style.
customer_reviews.author: Ana marrero

customer_reviews.title: Long wearing, compact and super easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I've repurchased this loads of times since 2014. I've bought brow products from other brands ranging from $1 to $30 and this is the one I keep returning to. I love how small it is, its easy to toss in your makeup bag, holds up extremely well and comes in a nice range of shades.
customer_reviews.author: JanaDR

customer_reviews.title: What a surprise!
customer_reviews.text: I have tattooed eyebrows that fade so every two years I have to get them touched up. I decided not to & tried this because it was inexpensive. It’s great. The wax makes it last all day & night.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Krogstad

customer_reviews.title: Natural looking
customer_reviews.text: This makes me look like I have full eyebrows. The 2 shades are more natural looking. I would have given 5 stars but the cover was cracked. I can still use and it won't affect its use, but I think the seller should wrap it more securely.
customer_reviews.author: AmyR

customer_reviews.title: Applicator issues
customer_reviews.text: The product itself was fine, and I liked that it came with the spoolie (super useful), but the applicator brush was too blunt at the end to get a sharp edge or mimic brow hairs. I ended up having to use an applicator from another product to get my brows right.
customer_reviews.author: Jacklyn Basso

customer_reviews.title: works well for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very compact size The ash brown color is still a little too red ish Small brushes need getting used to Stays on I still have to use a pencil to define my brow Going to use a brow shaper stencil as well
customer_reviews.author: wabi sabi

customer_reviews.title: Not crazy about this
customer_reviews.text: DEF. use setting spray with this product. My eyes brows tended to melt throughout the day because this product is oily and has a hard time sticking. It wasn't the best option in eye brow kits.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke M. Arrington

customer_reviews.title: More of a maroon or burgandy than auburn.
customer_reviews.text: I plain didn't like this. The color is not like the picture, it has a distinct cool burgundy/almost purple hue, NOT a warmer red/dark copper type look I was expecting. Nor did I like the two part system. With the sticky brush to put back in the tray, it can get gross as you can imagine. Returned it and went to a style in a tube that is similar to mascara, which I'm totally happy with.
customer_reviews.author: The Rancher's Wife

customer_reviews.title: Dark Brown isn’t very dark
customer_reviews.text: The dark brown isn’t very dark and it looks ashy on my dark skin. Comes off taupe/grayish looking. The product itself is fine but the color is misleading.
customer_reviews.author: lovecali

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product. Easy to use and decent brushes. I have blonde hair and love the color. First time I purchased this item but it will be my go to staple.
customer_reviews.author: Di O.

customer_reviews.title: Great for my low maintenance eye brows : )
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered a few of these and I have them at work, in both bathrooms, in my travel bag, etc. I had purchased a more expensive product and I ended up returning it because it did not feel right. Then I got this one and it has worked great for me. I am not very demanding with my make up, but some times I want a little definition in my eyebrows. This product is excellent and meets my needs. PS - I do not use the brush that comes with it, it is very stiff. I use a flat brush from elf, I think it is for liner.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: If You Have a Long Applicator Brush ....
customer_reviews.text: Hi, This is my first time with this product. My issue is directions on how to use the gel and powder together and with small applicators are difficult to work with. For the price I am please so far with this product. I would recommend having an longer eyebrow brush to make application easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly N.

customer_reviews.title: Covers gray nicely.
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed. As I age, not only do my eyebrows get thinner, but I get course white hairs also. This product has worked well for both issues. I find in my case, applying the wax first, helps the color cover those stubborn white hairs and also spreads more evenly. I have very dark eyebrows naturally, and I ordered the lighter shade so my eyebrows don't look harsh.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Sez

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for fake red heads! I have natural light brown eyebrows and this makes my brows look great and match my coppery hair! Sometimes my red is darker at the beginning when i just dyed it so the darker shade can be mixed with the lighter one to match perfectly. I get brow compliments all the time now. The only thing that isn't great is the brush, i use a eco tools flat liner brush and a small brow brush from some old milani kit and an elf spoolie brush. The one that comes with it is too stiff and thick to really do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Julia M

customer_reviews.title: Send instructions in readable print
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to remove if there is anything left at the end of the day. It is a good color. I haven't figured out what the instructions are because they're in such tiny print has to be illegible.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: It's a bit too weird
customer_reviews.text: The colors look ok in the powder form but not dark enough to use without the wax but once you apply it with the wax it takes on an oily consistency and makes it look bad on your brows. I bought this because I dyed my hair a deep red and then blonde copper. Non of the colors looked right, I went and bought different colors of pencils until I found a dark blonde I thought looked better. I would tell anyone who can work with this to buy it if you know how to make it work, I couldn't and I found it was not for me. I prefer pencils or simply using eye shadow for my brows.
customer_reviews.author: Sin

customer_reviews.title: TOO DARK - NATURAL COPPER REDHAIR
customer_reviews.text: I'm a natural red head with copper color red hair. The darker shade is just a touch too dark. The lighter shade looks brown on me. It does stay put when applied and it applies easily. I tried blending the two shades and it came out too brown.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: So natural looking, perfect color
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the color and natural look of this powder. All others I have tried always seem to be too reddish. It's so easy to apply and so reasonably priced! I've heard other women I work with talk about getting their eyebrows professionally tattooed ( we're all getting older and the eyebrows are getting very thin) but why risk big mistakes and the big $$ when in 15 seconds each day I can get a great look like this!?
customer_reviews.author: KRG

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for the color and consistency and wear for Asians with dark hair
customer_reviews.text: I have black hair and black eyebrows, and this color is just right! It doesn't make my eyebrows look too brown or stand out too much, and at the same time it subtly darkens them and shapes them. I was in between this color and the brown, and I'm glad I got this one. The wax makes me break out in my eyebrows, which can be annoying and painful. I suggest using the wax sparingly and washing it off thoroughly. The color stays on pretty well through the day as long as you don't rub it off.
customer_reviews.author: MojoKojo

customer_reviews.title: while I was in love with Anastasia Dip Brow for the consistency it just ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of this product for my brows, while I was in love with Anastasia Dip Brow for the consistency it just didn't look right texture wise, now that I'm using Nyx Cake Powder my eyebrows look more natural and they are a better color too, I use dipbrow to line the bottom and the follow up with this product for fill in and my brows look great. I use a different brush than teh one that came with it, in my opinion it could use some improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Trailer Park Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors and the easy application
customer_reviews.text: I love that there are two color options and they aren't too dark for me. I have a dark hair with light golden balayage and the color didn't make me look too bold. I also like that it comes with two applicator and the wax comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Zee K

customer_reviews.title: Long wear
customer_reviews.text: I love this eye brow powder. It’s difficult to find now in retail stores, so I’m glad Amazon had it. It lasts for hours and makes my eye brows look great!
customer_reviews.author: Nesa

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product a few times now with good results! However this most recent time the color is much darker than usual when I apply it. It is too dark to use on my eyebrows and looks very unnatural. I switched to a brow powder from Anastasia, a little pricey but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan R.

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail eyebrow product, most definitely.
customer_reviews.text: I use this every single day. It’s my go-to brow product. It’s easy to apply. I love the included spoolie. This eyebrow kit is easy to apply with a light hand to have a more natural look. Good for my fellow people with naturally thick dark brows.
customer_reviews.author: GlitterTrash

customer_reviews.title: Too light for eye brws
customer_reviews.text: It’s takes forever to just Line my braws color is too light for my braw. Please send darker colors (black/brown. The darker the better
customer_reviews.author: Jane Morant

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me...
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this product. It was very powdery and difficult to apply precisely. It looks like you are applying eye shadow to your eye brows. Not natural looking at all. I am fair skinned with light brown hair and my eyebrows are a bit darker than my hair, but sparse. I ordered the Blonde and it is still very dark on me. I have yet to find an eye brow pencil or kit that looks natural. I always wind up looking laughable and scary with eyebrow products. Another one for the trash can...
customer_reviews.author: D. Benge

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing how long I've had this product and how well ...
customer_reviews.text: I was using anastacia products until I found this one. It's amazing how long I've had this product and how well it continues to work. The best for those who need more thickness and shape for their eyebrows. I have medium to dark hair and I found the taupe/ash to be the best color option for me.
customer_reviews.author: CourtneyODaniel

customer_reviews.title: I really like this eyebrow kit
customer_reviews.text: I really like this eyebrow kit. It is simple doesn't go on too dark, nor go on too thick. I gave it four starts, instead of five because the brush spindle/mascara like brush isn't the greatest. Also, I don't personally care for the wax that sets it. Without the wax, I feel like it has a more natural look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome brows
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. Works great. Came w a lighter and darker brown. Stays on all day and I take off w makeup remover at night. The brush is little but love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice brow shaper for a good price better than using pencil, brushes work well
customer_reviews.text: Try it if you want to shape brows and fill for a more natural look with 2 shades to choose from. Great price and brushes aren’t bad they hold up and shape well
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Adds just a little extra
customer_reviews.text: My eyebrows are naturally a little sparse and my mom recommended this product to me after using it for several months. I love it! Helps add just a little extra without looking weird or too extreme. if you have dark eyebrows like me that aren’t quite as thick as you would like, I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail product! Love this stuff so much!
customer_reviews.text: OMG can I just say that I absolutely love this stuff! I am an esthetician & makeup artist & I've been using this for years! Seriously, it lasts soooo long! I finally just bought a new one, not because my old one is out, but because the lid has broken off & its very old! Time to replace, I love this color, it's perfect for me! I have reddish brown hair. This is my holy grail brow product! Will always buy again! I also use the nyx light brown brow pencil with it & they work sooo good together, last allll day & they are cheap!
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. When I got it, I thought that the shades would be too dark for my blonde eyebrows. I was wrong, they blend really easy with your eyebrows, but they make them visible and defined. The brush makes it really easy to apply the powder to your eyebrows, and the mascara-type brush allows the color to evenly spread across your eyebrow without making it look messy and fake. The wax also helps your eyebrows look evenly trimmed and thin. I would strongly recommend this to anyone with dirty blonde eyebrows or blonde-brown eyebrows, as long as your hair color isn't bleached blonde or too light, this will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

product_meta.title: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Eyebrow Cake Powder, Dark Brown/Brown
product_meta.description: Color:Dark Brown/ BrownCreate perfect brows with our eyebrow cake powder! This eyebrow kit includes wax, tools and a pair of complementary powders, dark brown and brown, which can be customized to create the ideal shade. Each eyebrow cake powder kit includes a slanted brush and a round wand to shape, style and tame eyebrows.
feature_bullets: EYEBROW CAKE POWDER: This eyebrow filling palette does the work of a brow gel, waxy pomade, brow pencil and brow powder all-in-one! Including two brushes, two complimentary brow colors to line, fill and shade, plus a waxy pomade to hold them in place.

COMPLETE BROW POWDER KIT: Each Eyebrow Cake Powder kit includes an angled brush for precise lining and filling eyebrows & a spoolie wand to comb and tame helping you create fuller more defined eyebrows from scratch!

FILL, SHAPE & SET: Building fuller eyebrows is easier than ever with our full line of NYX Professional Makeup eyebrow products including brow setters, pencils, pomades, brow gels, brow primers, tinting brow gel, clear brow get and brow filling powders!
CRUELTY FREE COSMETICS: We believe animals belong in our arms—not in a lab. All of our makeup is PETA certified cruelty-free. We don't test any of our products on animals.

DISCOVER NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP: Try all our pro makeup & beauty products, from eyeshadow palette, liquid eyeliner & eyeliner pencils, mascara & false lashes to lipstick, lip gloss, foundation, primer, blush, bronzer, highlighters, brushes & more!

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
